author: phabc
content: Binary search is also to handle EIP-114. Contract logic based on gas left should not be of concern of gas_estimate. I know for a fact that geth's gasEstimate does not care about this because we've had issues with internal txs reverting due to not enough gas while the outer tx still succeeds. It's way too hard to predict this imo
